metaDescription: Codelance GmbH is a software development company based in Baar, Switzerland. We develop web applications and mobile apps for startups and enterprises. We are experts in React, React Native, Node.js, and Next.js. We also provide consulting services for startups and enterprises. If you are looking for a software development company, you are in the right place.
metaKeywords: software development company, software development, software development services, software development agency, software development firm, software development companies, software development outsourcing, Software Development, Web Development, Mobile App Development, React, React Native, Node.js, Next.js, Startups, Consulting, Baar, Switzerland
quote: Let us help bring your IT project to life, from websites and customer apps to unique online products. Schedule a consultation with us to discuss your ideas and we'll find the perfect solution for you.
section_quote: We are a young, dynamic team specialized in the implementation of IT projects. We are your partner for the implementation of IT projects and the optimization of your IT infrastructure. Realize your IT projects with us and benefit from our many years of experience and know-how. We support you in the implementation of your IT projects and accompany you from planning to realization. We are your partner for the implementation of your IT projects. You have an idea? We make it real.
section_quote_small: We are a skilled team specializing in IT project implementation. As your partner, we support you from planning to realization and optimize your IT infrastructure. Have an idea? We'll make it happen.

portfolio_gibz_Description: With this project, we were able to create a new app design for the GIBZ vocational school. This allowed us to make an important contribution to the school's digital presence.
portfolio_amz_Description: Another project was the development of the new website for AMZ Racing. For this project we relied on the latest technologies. To realize this website with excellent performance, a modern design and a user-friendly UI.
